name: pnp-powerplatform-youtube-thumbnail-evaluator
title: YouTube Thumbnail Evaluator
shortDescription: Evaluates a YouTube thumbnail and provides feedback to ensure your thumbnails are engaging, clear, and clickable.
longDescription: Evaluates a YouTube thumbnail and provides feedback to ensure your thumbnails are engaging, clear, and clickable.

metadata.value: Evaluate the [youtube thumbnail] for clickability. Analyze contrast, text readability, subject emphasis, and emotional impact. Provide suggestions to improve engagement.

thumbnails.alt: AI Builder multi-modal prompt that valuates a YouTube thumbnail and provides feedback to ensure your thumbnails are engaging, clear, and clickable
